scripts.install:ci: if [ -f 'pnpm-lock.yaml' ]; then pnpm install --frozen-lockfile; else pnpm install; fi
scripts.check:all: mkdir -p gen && echo '=== VIBE MANAGER - COMPREHENSIVE CHECK RESULTS ===' > gen/all-checks-report.log && echo "Started at: $(date)" >> gen/all-checks-report.log && echo '' >> gen/all-checks-report.log && (echo '=== SERVER RUST ERRORS ===' >> gen/all-checks-report.log && pnpm server:check && cat server/gen/cargo-check.log >> gen/all-checks-report.log || echo 'No server rust errors found' >> gen/all-checks-report.log) && (echo '' >> gen/all-checks-report.log && echo '=== DESKTOP RUST ERRORS ===' >> gen/all-checks-report.log && pnpm desktop:check && cat desktop/src-tauri/gen/cargo-check.log >> gen/all-checks-report.log || echo 'No desktop rust errors found' >> gen/all-checks-report.log) && (echo '' >> gen/all-checks-report.log && echo '=== DESKTOP LINT/FORMAT ERRORS ===' >> gen/all-checks-report.log && cd desktop && (pnpm lint 2>&1 | grep -E '(error|Error|ERROR|✖|×|fail)' || echo 'No desktop lint errors found') >> ../gen/all-checks-report.log && (pnpm format:check 2>&1 | grep -E '(error|Error|ERROR|✖|×|fail)' || echo 'No desktop format errors found') >> ../gen/all-checks-report.log) && (echo '' >> gen/all-checks-report.log && echo '=== WORKSPACE TYPECHECK ERRORS ===' >> gen/all-checks-report.log && (pnpm typecheck 2>&1 | grep -E '(error|Error|ERROR)' || echo 'No workspace typecheck errors found') >> gen/all-checks-report.log) && echo '' >> gen/all-checks-report.log && echo "Completed at: $(date)" >> gen/all-checks-report.log && echo 'All checks completed. Error report saved to gen/all-checks-report.log'
scripts.server:check: cd server && DATABASE_URL=postgresql://localhost:5432/vibe_manager cargo check --message-format=json | jq -r 'select(.reason == "compiler-message" and .message.level == "error") | .message.rendered // .message.message' > gen/cargo-check.log
scripts.desktop:check: cd desktop/src-tauri && cargo check --message-format=json | jq -r 'select(.reason == "compiler-message" and .message.level == "error") | .message.rendered // .message.message' > gen/cargo-check.log
scripts.dev: echo "Running all components in dev mode is not supported yet. Run each component separately."
